execution_plan.description: Compute per-customer order counts in the EU database (grouped by customer email and name).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.email AS s1__email, customers.full_name AS s1__full_name, COUNT(orders.id) AS s1__order_count FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.email, customers.full_name;

execution_plan.description: Combine EU per-customer counts (from step 1) with US per-customer counts, producing a unified dataset of email, full_name, and order_count. The step runs on the US database and appends the EU rows via placeholders.
